title: Stable 230~ ping in game, in Dallas area. Usually get 35ish.
body:
After this patch, played one game tonight and just had straight 230 ping for the entire game, and it was stable like there wasnt any packet loss.

I ran the WinMTR program because I saw it in another thread to 104.160.131.1 and this was my result: 

|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|                                      WinMTR statistics                                   |
|                       Host              -   %  | Sent | Recv | Best | Avrg | Wrst | Last |
|------------------------------------------------|------|------|------|------|------|------|
|                              homeportal -    0 |  314 |  314 |    2 |    3 |   34 |    3 |
|107-204-20-1.lightspeed.rcsntx.sbcglobal.net -    0 |  314 |  314 |    3 |  116 |  601 |    6 |
|                            71.155.13.54 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    4 |    5 |   42 |    5 |
|                           70.143.193.34 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    6 |    7 |   47 |    7 |
|                            12.83.80.153 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    5 |    8 |   42 |    7 |
|                           12.122.85.193 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    5 |    8 |   40 |    7 |
|                          206.121.120.30 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    5 |    8 |   52 |    7 |
|                          104.160.134.35 -    0 |  314 |  314 |    5 |    8 |   41 |   10 |
|          ae35-br02.chi01.riotdirect.net -    0 |  314 |  314 |   25 |   28 |   65 |   27 |
|           ae1-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net -    0 |  314 |  314 |   25 |   28 |   58 |   27 |
|                           104.160.131.1 -    0 |  314 |  314 |   26 |   28 |   56 |   28 |
|________________________________________________|______|______|______|______|______|______|
   WinMTR v0.92 GPL V2 by Appnor MSP - Fully Managed Hosting & Cloud Provider


Doesn't look like an ISP problem (I have AT&T), I'm not in Houston but I am around North of Dallas. I only played one game, but it was abnormal. Went into customs for a few minutes and it continued to be like this.

replies.body:
Thanks for the traceroute! I'm not seeing any packet loss from that trace, but we are also aware of the ISP issues around the Houston area that have been impacting a lot of players. Do me a favor and check out the [**Lag Report Tool**](http://report.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/) and let me know how that's categorizing your internet score. It'd also be helpful to find the network logs for a game that lagged really hard, and letting this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) analyze it too.

All of this is in an effort to pinpoint exactly where these issues are stemming from, so that we can look into any possible ways of helping on our end of things.

The lag report tool is categorizing my internet at 93 and saying great quality. The log reader gave my internet a 90/100 in terms of connection score for that game as well.

Either way, seems like my league is back to normal this morning. Getting stable 38 in game. Could've just been an ISP thing that was also affecting me until it was fixed this morning. 

Thanks for the help!

**Also theres a Kalista bug thats killing me pls fix ;( **

Oooo be sure to bug report that Kallista thing either through the client or on the Report a Bug board! 

Glad to hear things smoothed out today!!!

Having this problem as well, started with really bad packet loss where my commands wouldn't register until 2.5 seconds after input resulting in the worst ranked game I've ever played. now my ping ranges from 42-200+ where the lower it is the more noticeable the packet loss is.
Also AT&T

I'm in Arlington, TX and every game before january 29th i had 0 - .1 % packet loss and steady 35ms now every game im getting results like this consistently 

lots of spiking packet loss and fluctuating ping

Spectrum internet

Avg Latency	52.66 ms
Avg Packet Loss	4.64%
Avg Jitter	12.31 ms
